content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
──────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage depot.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates (status: NO_FUEL; warnings: [“out of fuel”]).
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates (status: NO_INGREDIENTS; warnings: [“no ingredients to smelt”]).

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science pack(s) for research (status: NO_POWER; research: automation).
- Connected small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (8.5, 6.5), and (10.5, 7.5) forming an electricity network.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at positions 
(Boiler: -6.0, 24.5; Offshore Pump: -9.5, 24.5; Steam Engine: 2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for steam production (status: NO_FUEL; warnings: [“out of fuel”]); connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); currently linked with fluid_system=5268.
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water extraction (status: WORKING; fluid_systems: [5268]).
- Steam Engine at position(2.5, 21.5) for electricity generation (status: NOT_CONNECTED; warnings: [“not connected to power network”, “no input liquid”, “no fluid present in connections”]); connection points at (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5).
- Pipeline Network comprising multiple PipeGroups:
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=5268 at position(-6.5, 20.5) (status: WORKING).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=5269 at position(-2.5, 20.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=5270 at position(-0.5, 21.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=5275 at position(-3.5, 23.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=5274 at position(-7.5, 25.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=5279 at position(3.5, 25.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=5278 at position(2.5, 24.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=5281 at position(-0.5, 28.5) (status: EMPTY).
- Electricity Network: ElectricityGroup with id=1872 connecting poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), and (8.5, 6.5).

ERROR TIPS
──────────────────────
• PipeGroup Availability and Connection Failures:
  - Repeated attempts to supply water to the steam engine using fluid_system IDs [4924, 4967, 5010, 5053, 5096, 5139, 5182, 5225] have been unsuccessful. Confirm that a fully operational PipeGroup is available and that the pipeline network is stabilized before initiating connection attempts.
  
• Pipe Placement Obstructions:
  - Ensure that all intended connection points are free of obstructions prior to placing pipes.

• Multi‐Segment Pipeline Connection Challenges:
  - Verify that all intermediate pipeline waypoints are precisely aligned with both source and target connection endpoints during complex multi‐segment setups.

• Steam Engine Connection Configuration:
  - Reassess the configuration of the steam engine’s fluid input in tandem with updated pipeline parameters to resolve persistent connection issues.
